bugReport.Title: In user's personal account in address book section it is unable to add new address
bugReport.STR: 1. Log in to the site test.itcobra.ru 2. Click 'personal account'", 3. In drop-down list click 'personal account' 4. Click 'address book' 5. Click 'add new address'
bugReport.Enviroment: OS: Windows 10 x64 build 19043 Browser: Google Chrome v96.0.4664.45 x64
bugReport.Actual_result: Click on the button 'add new address' doesn't add new address
bugReport.Expected_result: Click on the button 'add new address' adds new address
bugReport.Author: Yana Aseeva
